price: 7. And they witnessed what they were doing against the believers (i.e. burning them).
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
